articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Taedonggang Terrapin Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Taedonggang Terrapin Farm

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the newly-built Taedonggang Terrapin Farm.
					
					 He was greeted on the spot by Ri Myong Su, minister of People's Security, Ri Pyong Sam, director of the Political Bureau of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), and others.
					
					 After being briefed on the farm before a large map showing its panoramic view, leader Kim Jong Il toured a general control room, internal and external terrapin ponds and other parts of the farm to acquaint himself in detail with its construction and terrapin cultivation there.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the full scene of the neatly spruced farm like a park and every well-balanced pond teeming with terrapins, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that solider-builders built in the revolutionary solider spirit this modern base for raising terrapins on the highest level of quality to win the admiration of even posterity.
					
					 Being told that it is possible to breed terrapin as big as over 0.5 kilograms in a matter of one year though it would generally take 4 or 5 years to raise mother terrapin in natural ecological environment, he said: This farm proved in practice that the word "impossible" is not to be found in the Korean vocabulary.
					
					 The farm is not only situated in good place to grow terrapin but equipped with the latest facilities, he said, adding it is a farm desired by the WPK, a socialist asset that can bring substantial benefit to the people.
					
					 The devoted efforts by the soldier-builders helped mass-produce rare-to-be-seen terrapins, he said, repeatedly lauding the merits of them, reliable defender and creator of the people's happiness, and giving thanks to them.
					
					 He advanced the tasks facing the farm.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The terrapin dishes are now served by only a delicacy restaurant under Okryu Restaurant. Such dishes should be served in other restaurants in Pyongyang including Chongryu Restaurant, too. This is what the WPK desires.
					
					 The farm should turn out 25 000 terrapins in the next year and then more than 100 000 terrapins annually in 2 or 3 years with reliance on its present production foundations.
					
					 It should also raise bullfrog as well as terrapin and tropical goldfish.
					
					 It would be desirable to produce handicrafts with terrapin shells.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed expectation and belief that officials and employees of the farm would discharge their honorable mission and duty as a servant for the people.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Mun Kyong Dok, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK who doubles as alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Ri Ryong Ha and Pak Pong Ju, first vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Visits New Pig Farm and Net-weaving Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Visits New Pig Farm and Net-weaving Factory

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il gave on-site guidance to the newly-built Taedonggang Pig Farm and Taedonggang Net-weaving Factory.
					
					 He, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, was greeted on the spot by Ri Myong Su, minister of People's Security, Ri Pyong Sam, director of the Political Bureau of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, and others.
					
					 The first leg of his visit was the socialist and modern Taedonggang Pig Farm built in the area of the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm.
					
					 After being briefed on the farm before a big map showing its panoramic view, leader Kim Jong Il toured interior and exterior of the farm, including general control room, insemination and delivery sty and pork processing shop to learn in detail about its construction, technical equipment, breeding and caring of pigs and pork processing.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the builders successfully constructed the modern pig farm in a little more than one year, he highly appreciated their devoted service for prosperity of the country.
					
					 It is admirable that a solid foundation was laid to raise fertility of orchard by increasing the production of organic fertilizer with excrement of pigs, he said, praising the farm for having implemented the Party's call for establishment of circle production system in pomiculture and stock-breeding which are in close relationship.
					
					 He was also pleased with the fact that effective steps were taken to ensure temperature favorable for pig breeding at blocks of sties and provide good ventilation by natural means and air conditioner.
					
					 He expressed pleasure over the fact that the builders of the Ministry of People's Security division of the 618 Construction Shock Brigade succeeded in research into the method of producing bricks by field heap calcination.
					
					 He was considerate of a lot of achievements made by teachers and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology to put into practice the Korean-style combined control system, and wished them success in their future work.
					
					 Watching collection of works and pencil drawings the solider-builders created truthfully reflecting their worthwhile life and struggle, he said: They are a laudable picture produced by the noble spiritual world of human beings in our era who spare no sweat and zeal for prosperity of the country.
					
					 At the end of the visit to the farm he again enjoyed a bird's eye view of the fruit farm. This is spectacular scenery that can be created only under the socialist system, and it is a good paradise in the era of Songun where every visitor will be eager to live, he said, repeatedly expressing his satisfaction.
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be carried out by the pig farm in its operation.
					
					 The next leg of his visit was the Taedonggang Net-weaving Factory built on a modern basis.
					
					 He toured spinning process, large bobbin winding process, net-weaving process and other production processes of the factory to acquaint himself in detail about its construction, technical equipment and production.
					
					 The factory is admirable in terms of construction and cultured practice, and it is a valuable wealth of the country as it is able to mass-produce various nets for covering orchards with less labor consumption, he said, highly appreciating the feats of its builders.
					
					 He learned in detail about structure, principle of operation and capacity of apparatuses before being satisfied over their delicacy and precision.
					
					 It is admirable that factory took steps to adjust diameters of nets for wide use not only in orchards but also in different fields of the national economy including fishery and weave nets of diverse colors so as to ensure light suitable to fruit growth in an effective way, he said.
					
					 The factory has an important duty to produce nets urgently needed not only in pomiculture and but also different fields of the national economy, he said, advancing important tasks facing it.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the factory would bring about a greater surge in production in the spirit of devoted service for the people and thus make signal contribution to improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 Accompanying him were Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C, the WPK, Mun Kyong Dok, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK who doubles as alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Ri Ryong Ha, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Rajin-Khasan Trial Train Service Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Rajin-Khasan Trial Train Service Made in DPRK 
						

					Rason, October 13 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of running a trial train between Rajin and Khasan section took place outside the DPRK-Russia Friendship Pavilion in the area of Tumangang Station in Rason City.
					
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Vice Minister of Railways Ju Jae Dok, Vice-Chairman of the Rason City People's Committee Hwang Chol Nam, officials in the field of the railways and working people in Rason.
					
					 Present from the Russian side were Valery A. Reshetnikov, senior vice president of the "Russian Railways" Company, Igor A. Sagitov, minister-councilor of the Russian embassy here, Vyacheslav Tsupikov, Russian consul-general to Chongjin, those related to the railways and other guests. 
					
					 Valery A. Reshetnikov, addressing the ceremony, said the bilateral cooperation in the railway transport now in progress amid the care of the top leaders of the two countries is a significant event in opening a new service line for freight transport.
					
					 The trial train service has greater significance as it is timed to coincide with the 63rd anniversary of the establishment of the DPRK-Russia diplomatic ties, he added.
					
					 Ju Jae Dok in his speech at the ceremony said that the train service will be recorded in the history of development of railway transport of the two countries.
					
					 The Rajin-Khasan freight transport will make contributions to the economic exchange not only between the DPRK and Russia but also Northeast Asia and Europe, he added.
					
					 Then followed congratulatory speeches.
					
					 The trial train departed for Khasan. 
					
					 A reception was given to celebrate the train service.

articles.title: WPK Secretary Meets Brazilian Delegation
articles.content:
WPK Secretary Meets Brazilian Delegation

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Thursday met and had a talk in a friendly atmosphere with a delegation of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil led by First Vice-President Carlos Batista Lopes when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.
					
					 During its stay the delegation witnessed the reality of the DPRK in which the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung was embodied, said Carlos Batista Lopes.
					
					 The rapidly-changing international situation proved the validity of the great Songun policy of leader Kim Jong Il, he said.
					
					 The Party for Free Motherland of Brazil would as ever extend full support and solidarity to the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people, he added.

articles.title: Gift from Brazilian Party
articles.content:

					 Carlos Batista Lopes, first vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, on a visit to the DPRK handed the gift over to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Thursday.

articles.title: Gift from Japanese Delegation

Gift from Japanese Delegation

articles.title: Greetings and Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Russian Personages

Greetings and Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Russian Personages

Ltd., of the Production and Technology Business of Serpukhov  City, Moscow Region on the 66th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Brazilian Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Brazilian Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil led by First Vice-President Carlos Batista Lopes visited the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae on Thursday. 
					
					 After being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and members of the Mangyongdae family, the guests looked round the historic relics at the home. 
					
					 They posed for a souvenir picture in front of the old home before touring revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, Party Founding Memorial Tower, e-library at Kim Il Sung University, Pyongyang Textile Mill, etc.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from U.K. Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from U.K. Ambassador to DPRK

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Karen Suzanne Wolstenholme, ambassador of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Senior State Officials Enjoy October Concert
articles.content:
Senior State Officials Enjoy October Concert

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- October Concert entitled "We Will Travel One Road Forever" was given by the Unhasu Orchestra at Unhasu Theatre Thursday.
					
					 The performance began with the playing of the national anthem. Its repertoire included female vocal solo "Care of Our Mother Party", male quartet "Light of Party Central Committee", orchestral music "The Girl on the Swing", narration and orchestral music "We Will Travel One Road Forever" and chorus "The Workers' Party Is Our Guide".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who carved out and glorified the new history of building the Juche-oriented revolutionary party and laid solid groundwork for the prosperity of Songun Korea.
					
					 The numbers reflected the deep trust of the army and people in the glorious WPK and the firm will of the people to push forward the building of a prosperous country in the spirit of the historic WPK Conference.
					
					 A narrative in the epilogue touched the heartstrings of the audience in particular, for its high ideological and political value and influential power.
					
					 Watching the concert were senior state officials, officials of the Cabinet, national institutions and those in the fields of culture, art and media as well as creators, artistes, journalists, pressmen, teachers and students in the field of art education.

articles.title: Vietnamese Ambassador Celebrates WPK's Birthday
articles.content:
Vietnamese Ambassador Celebrates WPK's Birthday

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Le Quang Ba hosted a reception on Thursday to mark the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, and Vice Director Pak Kun Gwang and other officials of the International Affairs Department of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Staff members of the Vietnamese embassy were on hand.
					
					 Le Quang Ba said in his speech that the friendship between the two parties, countries and peoples provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung has steadily developed on good terms under the deep concern of General Secretary Nguyen Phu Trong and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The successes achieved by the Vietnamese people are associated with the support rendered by the WPK and the Korean people, he said, adding:
					
					 The Vietnamese people, together with the friendly Korean people, will as ever make positive efforts for friendship and unity between the two countries.
					
					 Kim Yong Il said in his speech that the friendship between the two parties and countries is based on the comradeship forged by President Kim Il Sung and President Ho Chi Minh. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il's significant meeting with Nong Duc Manh in Pyongyang in October, 2007 was an epochal event that put the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and countries onto a higher stage, he added.
					
					 He wished the Vietnamese people more laudable success in the efforts to build a thriving Vietnam under the leadership of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Observed in Syrian Embassy
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed in Syrian Embassy

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Charge d'Affaires ad Interim of the Syrian embassy here Haissam Saad gave a reception at the embassy on Thursday to celebrate the 66th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Ui Chun, Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, chairman of the DPRK-Syria Friendship Association, Ri Chang Gun,Vice Department Director of the WPK Central Committee, Pak Jae Gyong,Vice Minister of the People's Armed Forces, So Ho Won, Vice-Chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Mun Jae Chol, Deputy Director of the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs and officials concerned. 
					
					 Haissam Saad said at the reception that general secretary Kim Jong Il was reelected as general secretary of the WPK last year, adding the struggle of the DPRK under his Songun leadership encourages the suppressed people.
					
					 He referred to the fact that the WPK has a kinship with the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party from long ago and extended support and encouragement to it. 
					
					 Pak Ui Chun said that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung and Hafez Al-Assad, eternal leader of the Syrian people, have steadily developed under the deep care of leader Kim Jong Il and President Bashar Al-Assad.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of Kim Jong Il to set store by the good relations of friendship and cooperation with Syria and boost them disregard of whatever changing situation, he noted, adding the DPRK will invariably and fully support the just cause of the Syrian people.

articles.title: Members of Chinese Embassy Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Members of Chinese Embassy Help Korean Farmers

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy in Pyongyang did a friendly work at the DPRK-China Friendship Thaekam Co-op Farm in Sunan District, Pyongyang on Thursday. 
					
					 The guests helped farmers harvesting rice.
					
					 The ambassador hoped the farmers would register bigger success in agricultural production.
					
					 They handed aid material to the farm.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Latin American Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Latin American Countries

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A DPRK Foreign Ministry delegation headed by Vice-Minister Kim Hyong Jun left here Thursday to visit some Latin American countries.

articles.title: Tradition of Great National Unity Provided by Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Tradition of Great National Unity Provided by Kim Il Sung

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- October 14 is the day when President Kim Il Sung delivered a historic speech at a Pyongyang mass rally held to welcome his triumphant return to the homeland.
					
					 In the speech he called upon all the Korean people to unite closely and build a prosperous independent and sovereign state. 
					
					 Earlier, the President advanced a unique idea of great national unity. He fully applied it to liberating the country and building a new society.  
					
					 One day before the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union on October 17, Juche 15 (1926) he told young revolutionaries that the masses should be rallied around the organization after its formation to liberate the country with their strength. 
					
					 At a meeting held in Huide County in November Juche 19 (1930), he said the Korean people could win the independence of the country only through their concerted effort. He called upon those with strength to give their strength, those with knowledge to contribute their knowledge and those with money to donate their money so as to pool wisdom and efforts of the 20 million Korean people. 
					
					 The President's idea of great national unity led to the foundation of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland, a permanent anti-Japanese national united front and a strong underground revolutionary organization, in May 1936. 
					
					 Its inaugural declaration written by him says that only when 20 million Koreans turn out in the sacred struggle for liberating the country, true to the ten-point programme of the association, can they surely win the independence of Korea. 
					
					 A valuable experience and tradition of great national unity were provided in the struggle for liberating the country by mobilizing all the anti-Japanese patriotic forces under the leadership of the President. 
					
					 After the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, he convened a historic April joint conference of representatives of political parties and public organizations in the south and north of Korea to prevent the division of the country sought by the U.S. imperialists and their instruments. 
					
					 He also put forward reasonable proposals and took many steps to achieve national unity and provide conditions favorable for the country's reunification in every period and stage of the developing revolution. 
					
					 In the 1970s he made a breakthrough in the deadlocked dialogue and negotiations between the north and the south and had the July 4 joint statement based on the three principles of national reunification adopted between the two sides. 
					
					 He offered a proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation in the 1980s and 1990s. 
					
					 It is a strong will of the Korean people to achieve national unity and reunification in line with the President's idea, feats, rich experience and tradition.

articles.title: Kayagum, Traditional Musical Instrument of Korea
articles.content:
Kayagum, Traditional Musical Instrument of Korea

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Kayagum is a string instrument peculiar to the Korean nation.
					
					 It was invented by Uruk, a musician of Kaya kingdom (mid-1st century-mid-6th century), in the early 6th century. So, it was called Kayagum.
					
					 Kayagum has been improved as required by the modern times, from pentachord to heptachord. 
					
					 In old days Kayagum performed only monophony but now polyphony is available with the instrument.
					
					 Kayagum is played as solo and ensemble or together with other instruments in orchestral music, instrumental ensemble and background music.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Lao Ministry of Information, Culture and Tourism led by Minister Bosengkham Vongdara, the delegation of the New Socialist Party of Japan led by Eiko Tomiyama, vice-president of its Central Executive Committee, and Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, and his party Thursday visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They bowed to Kim Il Sung in humble reverence.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Tombstone of King Kwanggaetho Mausoleum
articles.content:
Tombstone of King Kwanggaetho Mausoleum

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The tombstone of King Kwanggaetho mausoleum was erected by his son King Jangsu in 414. Kwanggaetho was the 24th king of the Koguryo Kingdom (277 B.C.-668 A.D.). His reign period was 391-412. 
					
					 The 6.34m-high tombstone was made with a large square tuff monolith. At that time it was the largest of its kind in the world.
					
					 About 1 800 letters were inscribed on the tombstone.
					
					 The epigraph tells the founding of Koguryo by Chumo (Kojumong), successive kings after him, Kwanggaetho's exploits, purpose of tombstone erection and regulations for protecting and managing the mausoleum.
					
					 It serves as a valuable material in getting a correct understanding of the history of Koguryo and the East.
					
					 The tombstone is standing on a hill in the east of Koguryo's walled capital city of Kuknae.

articles.title: Rebuilt Central Zoo in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Rebuilt Central Zoo in Pyongyang 

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Zoo, situated at the foot of picturesque Mt. Taesong in Pyongyang, has drawn many people after being reconstructed on an expansion basis.  
					
					 The zoo covering more than 100 hectares has 66 sheds for rare animals from different countries. 
					
					 An overpass was built around the outdoor beast playground consisting of rocks, forest and pool so that visitors can enjoy romping beasts.
					
					 An aquarium houses many kinds of rare fish.  
					
					  What is the most popular place in the zoo is where chimpanzees, monkeys and pet dogs perform tricks.
					
					 The zoo is furnished with a restaurant, beverage store, souvenir shop, amusement hall and other service facilities, as well as a modern veterinary hospital.

articles.title: Pyongyang Circus Performance Acclaimed in China
articles.content:
Pyongyang Circus Performance Acclaimed in China 

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Circus on a visit to China gave a performance before full houses at the Ge Zhihua Grand Theater in Zhang Jiajie City, Hunan Province from October 1 to 10.
					
					 Long Yuan, principal of the Libin Primary School in Zhang Jiajie, after watching the performance with pupils said the circus showed its appearance as a famous circus.
					
					 The DPRK is a country with developed arts, the principal said, adding they envy Korean students and artistes who are bringing into full bloom their talents under good system.
					
					 Peng Lin, director of the Commercial Company of the Zhang Jiajie Radio and TV Broadcasting Station, said the performance was of the highest standard.
					
					 It was spectacular and attractive, the director said, adding all the Zhang Jiajie citizens should watch it.
					
					 Zeng Wenze, director of the Wuhan Lilin Scientific and Technological Development Co. LTD., said that such an excellent aerial trapeze can hardly be found in any other country.
					
					 Only talented Korean people can create such acrobatic number, the director said, stressing the Korean people will work world-startling miracles in other fields, too.
					
					 Meanwhile, Hunan Satellite TV Broadcasting and Zhang Jiajie TV Broadcasting telecasted scenes of the circus's performance with the news of its visit to Zhang Jiajie.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK War Moves Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK War Moves Flayed

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers in a ceremony to commemorate the "Day of ROK Army" let "enemy forces" disguised in the Korean People's Army uniform stage exercises of crossing the 38th parallel and the River Rakdong holding the DPRK flag.
					
					 Minju Joson Thursday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The saber-rattling, a replica of the operations during the Korean war, is an open manifestation of their inveterate ambition to ignite a war against the DPRK. 
					
					 They are giving spurs to the moves to provoke a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Shortly ago, they committed serious provocation of airing anti-DPRK broadcasting by using frequency of the DPRK TV and radio. They even openly asserted they would use force if the DPRK take a countermeasure against their anti-DPRK psychological campaign. This shows how desperate they have gone in their moves to find a pretext to ignite a war. They have gone the lengths of firing at the DPRK flag while staging the exercises.
					
					 The south Korean conservative authorities are responding to the DPRK sincere efforts with the madcap DPRK-targeted war exercises and confrontation with it. They are working hard to do harm to the DPRK by force of arms in collusion with outside forces. But this is a daydream that can never come true.
					
					 They are well advised to clearly understand the will of the army and people of the DPRK and stop the dangerous war moves.

articles.title: Ceaseless Suicides Occur among S. Korean Workers
articles.content:
Ceaseless Suicides Occur among S. Korean Workers 

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- An ex-worker of Ssangryong Motors of south Korea committed suicide on Monday.
					
					 He was fired from his job at the company after its unionists' strike in 2009.
					
					 Failing to find a job and means of living despite his every effort, he committed suicide in protest against the inhumane treatment by the puppet authorities and the business side.
					
					 On Oct. 4 another worker of the company killed himself.
					
					 The ceaseless suicides in south Korea are touching off mounting resentment at the group of traitors who are to blame for them.

articles.title: Prosecution's Repressive Measure Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Prosecution's Repressive Measure Flayed in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A deputy spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea made public a commentary on Monday slashing at the puppet prosecution's repressive step against members of the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty.
					
					 The prosecution authorities are again asking for warrants of arrest for members of the Solidarity the application of which was turned down few months ago, the commentary noted, adding:
					
					 It is little different from a witch-hunt against the progressive forces to again raise the case which was rejected as a groundless one.
					
					 It is miscalculation if the prosecution authorities try to maintain through repression the ruling system in a danger due to the ceaselessly disclosed irregularities among the ruling forces.
					
					 The people will never pardon the prosecution seeking to protect the ruling forces through oppression while following the evil practices of the past dictatorial period.

articles.title: S. Korean Group of Traitors' Moves Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Group of Traitors' Moves Flayed

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued a statement titled "Let's defeat 
					
					 the group of traitors once again" on October 6.
					
					 The statement said that the election to Seoul mayor will be held on October 26 in south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean group of traitors are making desperate efforts to retrieve its big defeats in the election to local self-governing bodies in June last year and the by-election in April this year and retain the office of the Seoul mayor.
					
					 The coming election will offer a momentum for judging the present regime and the "Grand National Party" for their treacherous and anti-reunification crimes, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of the south Korean people and the urgent demand of the June 15 era of independent reunification to politically marginalize the present regime and the GNP engrossed in anti-reunification and treacherous acts, corruption and irregularities.
					
					 The upcoming election to Seoul mayor will be a site of showdown for terminating the fascist dictatorship, preserving peace and adhering to and implementing the June 15 era.
					
					 Therefore, the south Korean people should inflict a bitter defeat once again on the GNP going against the nation in the election.
					
					 The general federation and the Koreans in China will turn out in the righteous struggle to check and foil the plots of the group of traitors through alliance and solidarity with the south Koreans and completely drive the anti-reunification and treacherous group out of political circle.

articles.title: S. Korean Broadcasting Calls for Uprooting GIs' Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Broadcasting Calls for Uprooting GIs' Crimes 

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean KBS Tuesday called for uprooting crimes by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces present in south Korea.
					
					 GIs' crimes are on the steady increase, the KBS said, adding:
					
					 Shocking sexual assaults against teenage schoolgirls have recently been committed in succession.
					
					 On Oct. 9 when the people's anger at the sexual assaulters was running high, the U.S. army civilian employees were caught by police while committing highway robbery in Seoul. They were directly handed over to the U.S. Army Military Police.
					
					 This was due to south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA) which stipulates that Americans not taken in an act of crime shall be handed over to the U.S. side at its request and south Korea has the right to hold in custody GIs, U.S. army civilian employees or their family members who commit murder or rape only if they are caught red-handed.
					
					 SOFA does not grant the south Korean police the right to investigate the suspects, to say nothing of punishing them, unless the criminals are caught in the very act.
					
					 A policy switchover is prerequisite to prevent further damage. Now is the time to revise the shackling SOFA.
					
					 It is essential to take measures to uproot GIs' crimes including the harsh punishment of sexual assaulters.

articles.title: S. Korea's Fascist Politics Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Fascist Politics Flailed 

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued information bulletin No. 983 Thursday as regards the fact that the south Korean puppet group of conservatives has bolstered fascist repressive mechanism and bred whole gamut of anti-DPRK plots, clamping down on the progressive forces in the face of its serious ruling crisis following total domestic and foreign policy failure.
					
					 The information bulletin says:
					
					 The group of conservatives has staffed the Intelligence Service, Judicial Affairs Department, Supreme Court, Prosecutor's Office, Police Agency and other repressive bodies with ultra-right elements ill famed for the suppression of people under the pretext of public security. It even forced intelligence organs of the puppet army to keep track of civilians while massively adjusting and replenishing political watch and anti-DPRK plot-breeding organizations.
					
					 It openly declared a war with pro-north left-wing elements while faking up anti-DPRK farces including the "story of assassination", "underground tunnel" and "spy ring case". It even revived the measure council for public security which earned an ill fame in the period of military dictatorship and has kicked off the suppression of progressive forces. Its brutal crackdown on peaceable protesters demanding the right to existence has created security-oriented political situation reminiscent of that during the military fascist dictatorship.
					
					 This is a last-ditch effort to weaken anti-"government" forces and tide over the ruling crisis by creating terror-ridden atmosphere and thus turn the "election" situation in its favor and remain in power.
					
					 The puppet group has only done sycophantic treachery of leaving the nation's dignity, interests and even the people's lives to the mercy of outsiders. It has pursued unprecedented unpopular rule, turning south Korea into a land with the world's worst human rights record and a dark land where fascism stalks.
					
					 Its unprecedented anti-DPRK confrontational racket and war moves totally marred the north-south relations that had favorably developed after the advent of the June 15 era.
					
					 The people are mired in destitution and it is hard to find even a dreg of democracy and human rights in south Korea while the north-south relations have hit their lowest ebb, inching close to the brink of war after going beyond the phase of hostility, discord and confrontation.
					
					 The south Koreans' hatred and wrath against the group is running high and voices cursing it are heard even from the present ruling conservative forces.
					
					 The group is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can quench the voices of angered people, tide over the crisis and realize its ambition to stay in power through anti-DPRK smear campaign and fascist repression.
					
					 The "story of assassination", "underground tunnel", "spy ring case", etc. touted by the group of traitors are arousing derision and denunciation for their falsity and hypocrisy, increasing the people's disillusion and aversion for it.
					
					 High-handed practices, suppression and political frauds can never help it bar the people from advancing toward independence, democracy and reunification nor tide over the ruling crisis. It will only precipitate its ruin.
					
					 The group should stop security-oriented politics, aware that its persistent fascist rule and confrontation with fellow countrymen would hasten stern punishment of it by the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers to Stage Big Military Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers to Stage Big Military Exercises

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet army plans to stage military drill dubbed "Hoguk" in the areas of Kyonggi and North Chungchong provinces and south Korean Kangwon Province from Oct. 27 to Nov. 4, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					
					 Deployed in those areas will be reportedly troops of several units under its ground force and huge armed forces including tanks, armored vehicles and artillery pieces.

articles.title: Russia to Continue Nuclear Cooperation with China
articles.content:
Russia to Continue Nuclear Cooperation with China 

					 Moscow, October 12 (KCNA) -- Russia will continue cooperation with China in the nuclear power field.
					
					 Russia's Prime Minister Vladimir Putin made the remark at a press conference on Tuesday after talks with his Chinese counterpart Wen Jiabao. 
					
					 He said Russia will develop close cooperation with China in the nuclear power field on the basis of the experience it gained in building a nuclear power plant in China. 
					
					 The cooperation will be based on the latest technology, with any possible danger taken into consideration, he added.

articles.title: Russia, China Agree to Set Up Joint Investment Foundation
articles.content:
Russia, China Agree to Set Up Joint Investment Foundation 

					 Moscow, October 12 (KCNA) -- Russia and China concluded an agreement on setting up a joint investment foundation.
					
					 The scope of the foundation will be three or four billion U.S. dollars. 
					
					 It will start its work in the first quarter of 2012, according to a media report.

articles.title: Joint Buddhist Mass Calls for Improving North-South Relations
articles.content:
Joint Buddhist Mass Calls for Improving North-South Relations 
						

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A joint mass of Buddhists of the north and the south praying for national reunification on the 4th anniversary of the reconstruction of Singye Temple in Mt. Kumgang of the DPRK was held in the temple Thursday.
					
					 Attending it were officer-bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea, monks and believers of the temple from the north side and monks and believers of the south Korean Buddhist Jogye Order from the south side.
					
					 A Buddhist ritual was followed by speeches and a joint prayer of Buddhists for national reunification was read out.
					
					 Speakers said the joint mass in the wake of the recent Pyongyang visit by the delegation of the south Korean Buddhist Jogye Order is a manifestation of the unanimous will of the Buddhists in the north and the south to achieve unity in Dharma-minded concord, defend and implement the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in a do-or-die spirit and boost solidarity and cooperation for peace on the Korean Peninsula and the country's reunification.
					
					 The prayer clarified the firm pledge of the Buddhists to turn out in practical actions to improve the north-south relations and achieve reunification, peace and prosperity of the country so that south side personnel can freely visit the Singye Temple.

articles.title: El Salvadoran President Supports Founding of Palestinian Independent State
articles.content:
El Salvadoran President Supports Founding of Palestinian Independent State

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Mauricio Funes, president of El Salvador, in a conversation with Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on October 9 clarified the stand supporting the founding of the Palestinian independent state.
					
					 It is the hope of El Salvador that Palestine's joining the UN would be realized at an early date and that the relationship between the two countries would be strengthened, he said.

articles.title: PNA Condemns Israeli Atrocities
articles.content:
PNA Condemns Israeli Atrocities

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Palestinian National Authority in a memorandum addressed to the Arab League on October 10 condemned the Israel for its maltreatment of Palestinian prisoners.
					
					 Many Palestinian prisoners in Israeli jails are suffering brutal violence and living in a poor condition, the memorandum said.
					
					 The Palestinian prisoners are staging hunger strikes for several weeks in protest against Israeli maltreatment, it noted, calling upon the AL to hold an emergency meeting in this regard.

articles.title: Latin American Countries Strengthen Solidarity with Cuba
articles.content:
Latin American Countries Strengthen Solidarity with Cuba

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The movement for solidarity with Cuba has been intensified in Latin America.
					
					 A meeting for solidarity with Cuba was held in the capital of Mexico from October 6 to 9 with delegates of 30 countries in the region attending.
					
					 A declaration which was adopted at the meeting exposed the unreasonableness of the "Cuban Adjustment Act" which has forced and stimulated Cuban illegal immigration to the United States. It demanded the U.S. administration end the Act at once. 
					
					 It also demanded an immediate and unconditional release of five Cubans jailed in the United States since 1998.

articles.title: Iran Rejects U.S. Military Hotline Proposal
articles.content:
Iran Rejects U.S. Military Hotline Proposal

					 Tehran, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Iranian Navy commander in an interview with a TV on October 10 rejected the U.S. vicious attempt.
					
					 Recently, some U.S. media reported that the U.S. was considering setting up a direct military hotline with Iran after a series of encounters between the U.S. and Iranian forces in the Persian Gulf. In this connection the commander said the Islamic Republic has no interest in establishing a military-to-military hotline with the United States.
					
					 This region belongs to regional countries which are capable of establishing its security, he said.
					
					 A member of the National Security and Foreign Policy Commission of the Iranian Majlis (parliament) said Iran has rejected the U.S. offer which legitimizes the U.S. military presence in the Persian Gulf.
					
					 If the U.S. is worried about security in the Persian Gulf, it should immediately pull out its troops and warships from the region, he stated.

articles.title: China Criticizes U.S. Unreasonable Act
articles.content:
China Criticizes U.S. Unreasonable Act

					 Beijing, October 12 (KCNA) -- Cui Quankai, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of China, criticized the U.S. unreasonable act at the 2nd China-U.S. Asia-Pacific working negotiations held in Beijing on October 11.
					
					 China expressed strong discontent with the wrong act of the U.S. such as interfering in the internal affairs of China and impairing its interests as regards the Taiwan issue, the RMB exchange rate issue, etc. and is resolutely opposed to this, he said.
					
					 He strongly demanded the U.S. respect the core interests of China and a series of its concerns.

articles.title: 1,780 GIs Killed in Afghanistan
articles.content:
1,780 GIs Killed in Afghanistan

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- More U.S. soldiers in "anti-terrorist war" in Afghanistan met deaths due to the attack operations of the resistance forces of the country.
					
					 1,780 U.S. soldiers have died in Afghanistan since the start of the Afghan war, according to a CNN TV on October 7.

articles.title: Cooperation between China and Different Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation between China and Different Countries
						

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- China and Namibia vowed to further promote bilateral military ties on October 10.
					
					 China and Myanmar agreed to cooperate with each other in hydropower plant project on the same day.

articles.title: Anti-War Rally Held in Britain
articles.content:
Anti-War Rally Held in Britain

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- An anti-war rally was recently held at Trafalgar Square in London, Britain. About 5,000 masses were present at the rally which was held to mark 10 years of the U.S. war in Afghanistan.
					
					 Protestors demanded the British government immediately withdraw its troops from Afghanistan while chanting anti-war slogans.

articles.title: Poverty Gets Serious Worldwide
articles.content:
Poverty Gets Serious Worldwide 
						

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The number of people living in poverty is increasing in many countries.
					
					 There were an estimated 925 million hungry people in the world in 2010, according to UNFAO on October 10.

articles.title: Israeli Army Kills Palestinian
articles.content:
Israeli Army Kills Palestinian

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Israeli army is straining the regional situation by cracking down on Palestinians.
					
					 A Palestinian civilian was killed Monday afternoon in an Israeli army artillery shelling on the outskirts of northern Gaza Strip.
					
					 The Israeli army demolished a Palestinian house Monday near Bethlehem in the West Bank.

articles.title: Natural Disasters in Different Countries
articles.content:
Natural Disasters in Different Countries

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- 1 074 persons were killed and 9,127,000 persons evacuated till September this year in China due to various natural disasters.
					
					 The number of victims stands at 480 million and economic loss at 302.81 billion RMB. Y. 38.826 million hectares of crops have been affected.
					
					 Triangle of the River Mekong of Vietnam was damaged by flood caused by recent heavy rains. 24 persons were killed and six wounded as of October 10. At least 57 500 dwelling houses were inundated and about 24,000 hectares of farmlands and several hundred kilometers of roads destroyed.
					
					 Loss is expected to total 45.56 million U.S. dollars.
					
					 Damage caused by recent successive typhoon is expanding in Philippines. It left 101 persons killed, 27 others missing and tens of thousands homeless as of October 9.
					
					 Heavy rains fell in the Turkish Mediterranean province of Antalya on October 8, causing flood damage.
					
					 Six persons were reported missing, dwelling houses and bridges destroyed and schools closed.
					
					 Forest fire occurred in Corsica, France recently, causing damage.
					
					 Forest fire was spotted in 36 places which left more than 400 hectares of forests burnt, seriously polluting atmosphere.

articles.title: Myanmar Arrests 229 Drug Offenders
articles.content:
Myanmar Arrests 229 Drug Offenders

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Myanmar authorities arrested 229 narcotic-drug offenders in connection with 156 related cases exposed in September this year.
					
					 Seized along with the drug culprits were 0.122 kg heroin, 4.95 kg opium, 2.08 kg marijuana as well as more than 700,000 stimulant tablets, the Central Committee for Drug Abuse Control said on October 9.

articles.title: 770 School Workers Laid off in New York
articles.content:
770 School Workers Laid off in New York

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The New York City Education Authorities announced a plan to lay off jobs under the pretext of settling the financial crisis on October 7. According to it, more than 770 school workers have been laid off.

articles.title: U.S. Forces' Presence in S. Korea Termed Root Cause of All Evils
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' Presence in S. Korea Termed Root Cause of All Evils 

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Jong Sol Gyo, a progressive poet of south Korea, posted on an Internet paper an article titled "GIs, the occupation forces, and Women" on October 10.
					
					 The article recalled that the U.S. forces have so far brought all sorts of misfortunes to south Korean women by sexually abusing them as they pleased since the moment they landed in south Korea.
					
					 GIs' sexual assaults committed in Seoul and Tongduchon of Kyonggi Province were extremely bizarre and cruel crimes, the article said, and went on:
					
					 This being a hard fact, the authorities dare not punish GIs under the pretext of the unequal "SOFA" and, on the contrary, are sheltering the criminals.
					
					 It is the reality that the authorities have no right to investigate GIs' sexual assaults against girl students of south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. forces should not be allowed to stay in south Korea any longer, it held. 
					
					 The south Korean rulers are steeped in sycophancy towards the U.S. to the marrow of their bones as they are not in a position to protect teen-age girls.
					
					 Let all Koreans turn out as one in the struggle to drive the U.S. forces for peace, chanting the slogan "GI criminals, quit this land".
					
					 The U.S. forces are the root cause of all evils.

articles.title: Actions against Naval Base Construction on Jeju Island Called for
articles.content:
Actions against Naval Base Construction on Jeju Island Called for

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Catholic Solidarity for Peaceful Jeju Island on Monday issued a declaration protesting against the puppet authorities' naval base construction on Jeju Island.
					
					 The reason why the people are opposing the construction is that it will operate as a U.S. base for aggression threatening peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia, the declaration said.
					
					 It urged the authorities to halt the construction at once and make apology to Jeju islanders for suppressing their protest actions by riot forces. 
					
					 The organization stated that it would hand the declaration to Chongwadae and wage an intensive struggle in Kangjong village of Jeju Island and Seoul.

articles.title: Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A gathering for peace and reunification on the Korean Peninsula was held in New York on October 4 to mark the 4th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Koreans in the New York were present.
					
					 The "Declaration of Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity" was read out.
					
					 Then followed an appeal of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration on the 4th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Speeches were made.
					
					 The speakers said that compatriots of all walks of life overseas should make efforts to achieve peace and reunification keeping in mind that they are one nation irrespective of differing ideology and ism.
					
					 Speakers in a lecture said that it is the one and only task facing the Koreans in the U.S. to put into practice the joint declaration through the great unity of the Korean nation and achieve peace and reunification on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: CPV Plenum Closes in Hanoi
articles.content:
CPV Plenum Closes in Hanoi

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The 3rd plenary session of the 11th Communist Party of Vietnam (CPV) closed in Hanoi on Tuesday. 
					
					 The plenary session discussed such economic issues as increasing investment in three main sectors and reforming banking facilities, including commercial banks. 
					
					 General Secretary Nguyen Phu Trong in his closing speech called upon the whole party to pay much effort to implementing two important tasks -- socio-economic development and party building. 
					
					 He underlined the need to properly set tasks and goals for carrying out the 2011-2015 socio-economic development plan so as to promote the economic development in quality and quantity and achieve social equality and justice.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Embassies in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Embassies in Foreign Countries

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar, the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and the chairman of the National Workers' Party of Pakistan sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies in those countries on October 5 and 6 on the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked Abroad

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Seminars, lectures, photo exhibitions, book, photo and handicraft exhibitions and film shows were held in Britain, Mexico, Brazil and Guinea between September 29 and October 7 on the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 85th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					
					 Displayed in their venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il, photos on the undying feats they performed in leading the party building, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the creative skills of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and other speakers explained and proved that Kim Il Sung founded the WPK and strengthened it into an invincible party by creatively applying the preceding theories in keeping with the realistic requirements of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain noted that the formation of the DIU was a historic event which provided the roots for founding the WPK. The experience in building the WPK serves as precious guidelines for all the revolutionaries of Britain and the rest of the world, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the Coordinating Committee of the British Friends of the DPRK said that the reelection of Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK last year marked a political event which demonstrated once again before the world the solidity of the political foundation of the DPRK and the invincibility of socialism.
					
					 The international secretary of the Brazilian Communist Party stressed that his party would hold multifarious political and cultural events on the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung and always express support and solidarity for the cause of the WPK and the Korean people in the joint struggle against imperialism.
					
					 The film shown was Korean film "Pyongyang Today." 
					
					 A congratulatory message and letter to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events held in Guinea and Britain.

articles.title: Joint Seminar in Russia Marks WPK's Anniversary
articles.content:
Joint Seminar in Russia Marks WPK's Anniversary

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar was held in Sankt-Peterburg, Russia on October 5 on the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 At the seminar the general secretary of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions made a written report titled "Founding of WPK, a landmark event in revolutionary cause of Juche".
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK in October 1945, making it possible for the Korean revolution to more dynamically advance along the road of victory, the reporter said.
					
					 An independent and sovereign state was founded and the socialist revolution was successfully carried out under the leadership of the WPK, he noted.
					
					 Since general secretary Kim Jong Il started leading the party work, the WPK has grown stronger organizationally and ideologically and as the general staff of the revolution it has powerfully aroused all the party members and other working people to socialist construction, he said, and continued:
					
					 The WPK is exercising great influence on the international community together with the august name of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					  The chairwoman of the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia said: The Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il serves as an all-powerful treasured sword. The culture and arts of the DPRK are in full bloom with the revolutionary soldier culture as an example.
					
					 The chairman of the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism said that the WPK is making a steady victorious advance despite any storm and stress because it has pursued the Songun politics based on the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by Swiss Organizations

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on October 3 on the 31st anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) and the 4th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The statement made a detailed account of the fact that President Kim Il Sung advanced the proposal for founding the DFRK at the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea in October 1980.
					
					 The proposal is the most fair and aboveboard and realistic proposal to reunify Korea independently and peacefully, it said.
					
					 In order to realize this reunification proposal the U.S. troops should be withdrawn from south Korea and the south Korean authorities should recognize the principles of independence, neutrality and non-alignment, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The adoption of the declaration for the development of relations between the north and the south, peace and prosperity is a noteworthy event in the history of the Korean people's struggle for reunifying the country.
					
					 The declaration is based on the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The October 4 declaration calls for achieving the reunification of the country by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 We positively support the proposal for founding the DFRK and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Chinese Paper
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Chinese Paper

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- China's People's Daily on October 10 carried an article titled "DPRK striving to attain strategic goal".
					
					 Under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea the Korean people are effecting a great surge in production and construction in all sectors, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK built modern chicken, duck, fish and goat farms, etc. in different parts of the country and made good progress in agricultural science and technology.
					
					 The Chollima Steel Complex built UHP electric arc furnaces and developed and introduced new fireproof materials. The Posan Iron Works introduced computer control system to the Juche iron production process and the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex built a Korean-style Juche iron furnace and is pushing forward the updating of production processes.
					
					 Many factories in the light industrial field are being rebuilt on an expansion basis.
					
					 The DPRK is also channeling efforts into urban construction.
					
					 In Pyongyang City the construction of apartment houses is underway with those in Mansudae Street as an example and catering units including Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant and restaurants in Changgwang Street of Chain of Restaurants have been renovated.
					
					 Citizens are all out for city greening including tree planting.
					
					 Mt. Myohyang, the Kaeson Youth Park, the Taedongmun Cinema, the Central Zoo and other scenic spots and cultural facilities have been steadily spruced up.
					
					 Many art works to satisfy the need for ideological and emotional life of the people have been created.
					
					 The DPRK has not a few difficulties but is steadily advancing to attain the strategic goal under the leadership of the WPK and the government.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Art Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Art Exhibition Opens in China
						

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and fine art exhibition was opened in Shanghai, China on October 10, the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Displayed in the exhibition hall were works of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and photos on the undying Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and his successful visit to China.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos on the historic Conference of the WPK and celebrations of the 65th anniversary of the WPK, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and fine art works associated with the creative wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted.

articles.title: WPK Anniversary Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
WPK Anniversary Observed in Different Countries

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Figures of political parties and organizations in different countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries from Oct. 5 to 8 on the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They included personages of different strata in Nakhodka, Pokino, Artyom and Partizansk cities of Russia, the secretary of the Nakhodka Branch of the "United Russia" Party, the chairman of the Nakhodka Regional Committee of "A Just Russia", members of the congratulatory group of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the chairman and members of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the editor-in-chief of the Nakhodkinski Rabochi, the general secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Democratic Congo, the deputy secretary general of the National Executive Committee of the People's Party for Reconstruction and Democracy of Democratic Congo, the chairman of the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, the vice-chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo, the chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimjongilism, the chairman of the Nig
					
					 erian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and the chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Work Published in Iran
articles.content:
Work Published in Iran

					 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Hadian Publishing House of Iran on Oct. 4.
					
					 The work, published on September 5, Juche 97 (2008), refers in detail to the fact that the invincible might of the DPRK lies in preserving and eternally glorifying President Kim Il Sung's Juche-oriented idea of nation-building and exploits performed in it.

articles.title: Servicio ejemplar del tren Rajin-Khasan
articles.content:
Servicio ejemplar del tren Rajin-Khasan

					 Rason, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 el acto por el servicio ejemplar del tren Rajin-Khasan frente al Pabellon de Amistad Corea-Rusia erguido en la zona de la Estacion Ferroviaria Tumangang de la ciudad de Rason de la provincia de Hamgyong del  Norte.
					
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el viceministro de Ferrocarril, Ju Jae Dok, el vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Rason, Hwang Chol Nam, funcionarios de la rama ferroviaria y trabajadores de dicha ciudad.
					
					 Ademas, asistieron el superior vicepresidente general de la Compania Anonima "Ferrocarril de Rusia" Valery Reshetnikov, el consejero ministro de la Embajada de la Federacion Rusa en Corea Igor Sagitov, el consul general de la FR en Chongjin Vyacheslav Tsupikov, los interesados de la rama y otros huespedes rusos.
					
					 Valery Reshetnikov, al hacer uso de la palabra, subrayo que la cooperacion en la rama de transporte ferroviario, que se realiza bajo la atencion de los maximos Dirigentes de los dos paises, sirve de un evento significativo en abrir la nueva via de carga.
					
					 Dijo que el servicio ejemplar del tren coincide con el 63o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre los dos paises, razon por la cual tiene suma importancia.
					
					 Ju Jae Dok se refirio en su discurso a que el servicio ejemplar del tren se registrara en la historia de desarrollo de transporte ferroviario de ambos paises.
					
					 Expreso su conviccion de que el transporte ferroviario de carga en el tramo Rajin-Khasan contribuira al intercambio economico tanto entre los dos paises como entre el Asia Noreste y Europa.
					
					 Seguidamente, hubo palabras de felicitacion.
					
					 El mismo dia, se ofrecio un banquete en relacion con el servicio ejemplar del tren.

articles.title: Acto conjunto de budistas Norte-Sur por la reunificacion de Corea
articles.content:
Acto conjunto de budistas Norte-Sur por la reunificacion de Corea

					 Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en el Templo Singye del monte coreano Kumgang el "Acto conjunto de budistas Norte-Sur par rezar la reunificacion de la patria por el IV aniversario de la reconstruccion del Templo Singye del monte Kumgang".
					
					 En la ocasion participaron los clerigos del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea, los monjes y los creyentes del citado templo, por la parte norcoreana y por la surcoreana, los monjes y creyentes de la Orden Budista Jogye.
					
					 Hubo ceremonia budista e intervenciones y se dio lectura a la oracion conjunta de budistas N-S para rezar la  reunificacion de Corea.
					
					 Los oradores subrayaron que la recien visita de la delegacion de la Orden Budista Jogye del Sur de Corea a Pyongyang y el actual acto demuestran la unanime voluntad de los budistas de ambas partes coreanas de defender y materializar cabalmente la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre con las fuerzas unidas bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y fortalecer mas la solidaridad y la cooperacion en el camino para lograr la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 En la nota se expresa la firme decision de los budistas del Norte y el Sur de Corea de levantarse activamente en el acto para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y lograr la reunificacion, la paz y la prosperidad del pais, para que los surcoreanos adoren libremente en el mencionado templo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador britanico
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador britanico

					 Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- Karen Suzanne Wolstenholme presento el dia 13 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de Gran Bretana en Corea.
					
					 Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el nuevo embajador britanico.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia represion del Sur de Corea a fuerzas progresistas
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia represion del Sur de Corea a fuerzas progresistas

					 Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC)-- En estos dias, la banda conservadora titere del Sur de Corea actua freneticamente para reprimir a las fuerzas progresistas fortaleciendo los aparatos de represion fascista y fabricando los incidentes intrigantes anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a fin de librarse de la grave crisis de dominacion por la fracasada politica interior y exterior.
					
					 Al respecto, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 13 la informacion No. 983, como sigue:
					
					 La banda conservadora surcoreana formo el Servicio de Inteligencia, el Ministerio de la Justicia, la Corte Suprema, la Fiscalia General y la Oficina de Politica Nacional y otros organos de represion fascista con los recalcitrantes elementos ultraderechistas quienes participaron en el pasado en la sangrienta represion fascista y movilizo hasta el organo de inteligencia del ejercito titere para vigilar a los habitantes civiles.
					
					 Por otra parte, arreglo y reforzo en gran escala los aparatos de vigilancia politica interior y los intrigantes anti-RPDC.
					
					 Invento uno tras otro las artimanas anti-RPDC, tales como el "rumor de asesinato cauteloso", la "galeria", el "incidente del equipo de espias" y la "provocacion" y proclamo abiertamente la "guerra contra la izquierda pro-Norte", asi como resucito la infame reunion de medidas de seguridad publica de la epoca dictatorial del circulo militar para usarla en reprimir a las fuerzas progresistas y las manifestaciones con fines pacificos de los habitantes de distintos sectores en demanda del derecho a vivir.
					
					 Por tanto, ahora en el territorio surcoreano se crea la horrorosa "situacion politica de seguridad publica" como en el periodo de la dictadura fascista militar.
					
					 Tales maquinaciones de la banda titere son el esfuerzo desesperado por dilatar su "poder" creando el ambiente terrorifico y fascista tendente a acobardar a las fuerzas antigubernamentales, salvar la crisis de dominacion y cambiar la coyuntura desfavorable de elecciones.
					
					 Como es conocido por todos, la banda titere, durante su mandato, sacrifico por las fuerzas extranjeras la dignidad e intereses de la nacion y el derecho a vivir de los habitantes y convirtio el territorio surcoreano en el infierno de DDHH y en la sociedad oscura de fascismo practicando la malsana politica antipopular y sablazos fascistas sin precedentes.
					
					 En particular, debido a la confrontacion anti-RPDC y las maquinaciones belicas fueron congelados las relaciones intercoreanas que se desarrollaban favorablemente despues de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					 Ahora, en el Sur de Corea se arruino la vida de los habitantes y desaparecieron la democracia y los derechos humanos, y las relaciones intercoreanas se empeoraron.
					
					 El rencor y la colera de los habitantes surcoreanos hacia la banda titere han llegado hasta el cielo y hasta entre las fuerzas conservadoras en el poder se oyen las voces de desilusion y la condenacion.
					
					 La banda titere intenta reprimir vanamente la opinion publica enojada, salvar la crisis y realizar su ambicion de retomar el poder recurriendo a las campanas intrigantes anti-RPDC y la represion fascista.
					
					 Todos los rumores arriba mencionados suscitan solo burlas y censuras internas y externas y aumenta mas la desilusion y aversion de los habitantes por su absurdidad y la naturaleza fraudulenta.
					
					 Con la coaccion, la represion y la politica intrigante, no se puede impedir el camino de los habitantes hacia la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion ni salvar la crisis de su mandato y solo anticipara la derrota de la banda de los traidores.
					
					 La banda titere debe poner fin de inmediato a la campana de creacion de la "situacion politica de seguridad publica" dandose clara cuenta de que si recurre a su dominio fascista y la confrontacion fratricida, adelantara el dia de severa sentencia.
